portfolio website.

Web Development | Web Design.

For the course "Produktutveckling i medieteknik med metoden Design-Build-Test" we were tasked with creating a porfolio website. To do this I began by creating some rough concept designs in Adobe Xd for how my website could look. Once I managed to create a concept design that I was satisfied with I began creating the website.

I decided to develop the website using HTML, Sass and JavaScript in order to achieve my desired outcome. This current version is the first of many and I intend to update it in the future to make it more responsive and add more animations to, among other things the hamburger menu.
